review: The audio through the Amazon Fire TV is very tinny.  When we stream the same program through our Blu Ray player the sound is much better (played through the same sound bar). The Fire TV is not used because of the audio problems.  Save your money.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The Amazon Fire TV is a pretty exceptional little device. First off, it is small and unobtrusive, making it easy to store just about anywhere. Second, the remote feels solid and well made. The voice activation is incredibly easy to use; you hold the 'mic' button down on the remote, and speak into the built-in microphone (on the remote). This is important, because I don't feel like I have to yell, like I do sometimes with my Xbox One's Kinect.The interface is easy to use and navigate and is very responsive. Apps launch within a second of selecting them. All in all, I am extremely pleased with this purchase, as I was considering several other options. Definitely recommend it.
author: Brian Miller
